channel.title: IdeateSketchUseEvaluate on My Blog : Célestin HERNANDEZ

item.title: Lecture 07, 08 & 09 : Ideate, Sketch, Use and Evaluate
item.description: Ideating at least three potential human abilities enhancing apps in AR. Okay so right out of the gate when I heard enhacing human abilities I immediatly thought about sports because this is where our most basic abilities as animals are displayed. I’m not a huge sports person and that’s because I’m not that good at coaching myself. I either lack motivation or advices to successfully complete programs / exercises. That’s why I would to introduce you to A(R)pollon.
